coref_content: Sicario open with a nightmarish look at the battle between U.S. law enforcement and the mexican drug cartel along the Arizona border. while track lead in a kidnapping case, FBI agent Kate Macer ( Emily Blunt ) and FBI agent Kate Macer ( Emily Blunt )'s team make the horrific discovery.
